name: My best friend at school?
description:
This is a game about memory. About how we forget.

Everything starts clearly.

Remember the face of your best friend. Remember their name, the colour of their eyes, their hair. Remember what they loved to do, how you whiled away those childhood summers.

And then watch as your memory begins to fade.

Use the left-click and drag the mouse to pull their features back into place. Left-click on each feature, and the text, to correct the colours and the story as everything corrupts with time.

Fight for as long as you can, to remember your best friend.

Nothing stays forever. (Weekly Game Jam 160).
